participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Sociable and laid-back, Jake enjoys connecting with others at the gym and has a passion for cars.
participant_1.background: i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home. i like to spend my money on cars.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Caring and creative, Emily finds joy in her feline companions and takes pride in her work as a construction worker.
participant_2.background: i have 5cats. my cats are very special to me. i enjoy building houses. i am a construction worker.
